Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <M.> So does VRSC help KMD or completely independent?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: I work closely with miket (lead dev of VRSC https://veruscoin.io/#contributors Former Vice President and Technical Fellow at Microsoft, recognized founder and architect of Microsoft's .Net platform, ex-Technical Fellow of Microsoft's advertising platform, ex-CTO, Parallels Corporation) and we help each other out. In fact, he is one of the few that I have known in crypto that can keep up with me at the core level. If there were dozens of VRSC caliber projects in the KMD ecosystem it would be a very good thing. miket invented the timelocked block rewards and the unique coin emission for VRSC and I look foward to his innovations in the voting and identity space using KMD
